popover.primary: A mastery path focused on immediate damage
A mastery path focused on longer-duration effects
A mastery path focused on wide-area effects

data.name: Absorb Vitality
data.note:
Builds 5 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: A Curse which siphons away your enemy's life, dealing 600 Corporeal damage over 15 seconds and healing you for all of the damage dealt.
data.rawDescription: A Curse which siphons away your enemy's life, dealing {COM_2_VAL0_TOD_CORPOREALDAMAGE} over {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS} and healing you for all of the damage dealt.

data.name: Alignment of Naggaroth
data.description: Spiritual resistance increased by 252.
data.rawDescription: Spiritual resistance increased by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Arctic Blast
data.note:
Builds 10 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: You send a blast of dark energy slamming into your target, dealing 320 Spirit damage.  If the victim is Cursed, then they will also become snared for 5 seconds, reducing their movement speed by 40%.
data.rawDescription: You send a blast of dark energy slamming into your target, dealing {COM_2_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE}.  If the victim is Cursed, then they will also become snared for {COM_3_DURA_SECONDS}, reducing their movement speed by {COM_3_VAL0}%.

data.name: Bathing In Blood
data.description: Any time you kill an enemy, you will regain 471 health over 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Any time you kill an enemy, you will regain {ABIL_3260_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} over {ABIL_3260_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Black Horror
data.note:
Builds 10 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: You create a maelstrom of evil power which deals 316 Corporeal damage to your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them, and reduces their Initiative by 50 for 20 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You create a maelstrom of evil power which deals {COM_2_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} to your target and all other enemies within {COM_2_RADI_FEET} of them, and reduces their Initiative by {COM_3_VAL0} for {COM_3_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Chilling Gusts
data.description: Each time Chillwind or Ice Spikes damages an enemy, there is a 33% chance that the victim will suffer an additional 166 Corporeal damage as well.
data.rawDescription: Each time Chillwind or Ice Spikes damages an enemy, there is a 33% chance that the victim will suffer an additional {ABIL_9471_COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} as well.

data.name: Chillwind
data.note:
Builds 5 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: A Curse which deals 432 Corporeal damage to your target over 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: A Curse which deals {COM_2_VAL0_TOD_CORPOREALDAMAGE} to your target over {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Close Quarters
data.description: Your cast times are reduced to 50% when you are within 20 feet of your target.
data.rawDescription: Your cast times are reduced to {COM_0_VAL0}% when you are within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Crippling Terror
data.description: Your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them are Silenced and Disarmed for 7 seconds, making them unable to use melee, ranged, or magic abilities. This ability hits max 9 targets.
data.rawDescription: Your target and all other enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} of them are Silenced and Disarmed for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, making them unable to use melee, ranged, or magic abilities. This ability hits max 9 targets.

data.name: Daemonic Chill
data.description: Everyone in your group that is within 100 feet of you is surrounded by a demonic chill for 1 hour, giving them a 25% chance to deal 125 Corporeal damage back against the attacker when they are struck by a melee attack.
data.rawDescription: Everyone in your group that is within 100 feet of you is surrounded by a demonic chill for 1 hour, giving them a 25% chance to deal {COM_1_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} back against the attacker when they are struck by a melee attack.

data.name: Dark Blessings
data.description: Direct heals cast on you will recover 10% more health.
data.rawDescription: Direct heals cast on you will recover {COM_0_VAL1}% more health.

data.name: Darkstar Cloak
data.description: None of your abilities will consume action points for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: None of your abilities will consume action points for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Devour Energy
data.description: Whenever one of your spells hits an enemy, you have a 25% chance to regain 30 Action Points. This effect cannot occur more than once every 2 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Whenever one of your spells hits an enemy, you have a 25% chance to regain {COM_1_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}. This effect cannot occur more than once every {COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Dhar Wind
data.note: Consumes all Dark Magic
data.description:
You expel all of your build-up Dark Magic in a deadly blast, dealing damage to your target based on the amount of Dark Magic that was consumed.
1 - 10 Dark Magic: 75 damage.
11 - 30 Dark Magic: 150 damage.
31 - 70 Dark Magic: 300 damage.
71 - 90 Dark Magic: 600 damage.
91 - 100 Dark Magic: 750 damage.
data.rawDescription:
You expel all of your build-up Dark Magic in a deadly blast, dealing damage to your target based on the amount of Dark Magic that was consumed.
1 - 10 Dark Magic: {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}.
11 - 30 Dark Magic: {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE}.
31 - 70 Dark Magic: {COM_2_VAL0_DAMAGE}.
71 - 90 Dark Magic: {COM_3_VAL0_DAMAGE}.
91 - 100 Dark Magic: {COM_4_VAL0_DAMAGE}.

data.name: Dire Blast
data.description: Deals 600 damage to your target immediately, and another 1206 damage over 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your target immediately, and another {COM_1_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Disastrous Cascade
data.note:
Builds 15 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: You allow dark powers for flow freely through your body for up to 3 seconds, dealing 180 Spirit damage every second to all enemies within 30 feet.  This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Doombolt

Builds 10 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!

data.rawDescription: A massive burst of dark power which deals {COM_2_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} to your target.

data.name: Dread Aspect
data.description: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds.  If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.
data.rawDescription: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only {COM_0_VAL0}% damage to you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.  If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.note:
Only usable after an enemy Disrupts one of your spells

Has a chance to cause a Backlash!

data.name: Empowered Dhar
data.description: Dhar Wind will now restore your action points, returning an amount equal to the Dark Magic which was expended.
data.rawDescription: Dhar Wind will now restore your action points, returning an amount equal to the Dark Magic which was expended.

data.name: Endless Knowledge
data.description: Increases your Intelligence by 160.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Intelligence by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.
data.rawDescription:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.
data.rawDescription: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.
